code.run_instructions: composer install && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && touch database/database.sqlite && php artisan migrate --seed && php artisan test
code.notes: All code examples should be minimal but complete. Use SQLite to avoid external dependencies.

document.run_instructions: Open the markdown files in any markdown viewer or editor
document.notes: Document examples should include both empty templates and filled examples

diagram.run_instructions: View .mermaid files in any Mermaid-compatible viewer (VS Code, GitHub, etc.)
diagram.notes: Use Mermaid for diagrams as they render in GitHub and most markdown viewers

template.run_instructions: Copy and customize the templates for your needs
template.notes: Templates should be well-commented with placeholders clearly marked

dataset.run_instructions: Import the data files into your application or database
dataset.notes: Include both sample data and schema definitions

config.notes: Configuration examples should be self-contained and runnable with Docker

other.notes: Document thoroughly as the example type may not be obvious
